user_query: I'm planning to play the Cash4Life lottery on January 5th, 2023. Can you give me the winning number set from that drawing date? Moreover, I'm curious about the related collections and movies for a specific show in the VOD App.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the winning numbers for the Cash4Life lottery drawing on January 5th, 2023.
Search for related collections and movies for a specific show in the VOD App.
